title: Ghost buster 500

properties.name: description
properties.value: The ghost buster 500 was used during the 2013 Halloween event in order to defeat poltergeists that possessed toys in Diango's workshop. It started out empty, but could be loaded with several different destabilisers. When loaded with a white destabiliser, shooting a possessed toy would reveal a coloured poltergeist that could then be defeated by loading the corresponding destabiliser and shooting again.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ghost buster 500
 Ghost buster 500 was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.

The ghost buster 500 was used during the 2013 Halloween event in order to defeat poltergeists that possessed toys in Diango's workshop. It started out empty, but could be loaded with several different destabilisers. When loaded with a white destabiliser, shooting a possessed toy would reveal a coloured poltergeist that could then be defeated by loading the corresponding destabiliser and shooting again.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

A player loading the ghost buster 500 with a destabiliser.
  • When given the explanation on how to use the Ghost buster 500, Diango would warn "Whatever you do, don't cross the streams!" This was a reference to the Ghostbusters movie.

The '''ghost buster 500''' was used during the [[2013 Halloween event]] in order to defeat poltergeists that possessed toys in [[Diango]]'s [[Diango's Workshop|workshop]]. It started out empty, but could be loaded with several different [[destabiliser]]s. When loaded with a [[white destabiliser]], shooting a possessed toy would reveal a coloured poltergeist that could then be defeated by loading the corresponding destabiliser and shooting again.

==Trivia==
[[File:Loading_ghost_buster_500.gif|thumb|left|A player loading the ghost buster 500 with a destabiliser.]]
*When given the explanation on how to use the Ghost buster 500, Diango would warn "Whatever you do, don't cross the streams!" This was a reference to the ''{{WP|Ghostbusters}}'' movie.
{{2013 Halloween event}}
